alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, west central Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 226 PM EDT/126 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Blountstown, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Marianna, Sneads, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Ocheesee, Selman, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Star, Alliance, Blountstown Airport, Chason, Sink Creek, Center Lake and Willis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
